title: Roger Goodell: 18-game season is not a given

sources.name: Yahoo Sports NFL
sources.title: Roger Goodell: 18-game season is not a given
sources.description: Patriots owner Robert Kraft said recently that "every team will go to 18" regular-season games at some point in the future, but NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell was less emphatic about that when asked about adding a game to the slate during a press conference in San Francisco on Monday.
